hadiths.text: Abu Hassan reported:It was said to Ibn 'Abbas (Allah be pleased with them) that this affair had engaged the attention of the people that he who circumambu- lates the House was permitted to circumambulate for Umra (even though he was in a state of Ihram for Hajj), whereupon he said: That is the Sunnah of your Apostle (ﷺ), even though you may not approve of it

chapter.ara-name: باب تَقْلِيدِ الْهَدْىِ وَإِشْعَارِهِ عِنْدَ الإِحْرَامِ
chapter.eng-name: Marking and Garlanding the sacrificial animal when entering Ihram
